thread.title: Behind Richard Gates’ Guilty Plea in the Russia Probe

author: Aruna Viswanatha
title: Behind Richard Gates’ Guilty Plea in the Russia Probe
text:
Nearly until Richard Gates walked into court to plead guilty to conspiracy in a deal with Special Counsel Robert Mueller, some of the former Trump’s aide’s closest friends didn’t know he had sat for hours of interviews with investigators. 
They believed he was still gearing up for a fight, according to interviews with multiple people familiar with the events.

New... RELATED VIDEO What People Really Mean When They Say 'Collusion' When it comes to the Russia investigation, the word "Collusion" gets thrown around a lot. But there's not a lot of clarity on what it actually means. Is it illegal? Is it grounds for impeachment? We asked a law professor to explain. Photo Illustration: Drew Evans/The Wall Street Journal.
